price: 75.Yalli malaykak isi ambiyâ fanah ruuba farmoytitte doora isi wacyi ken guddussamkeh, kaadu sinaamak farmoytittey Yallih farmó sinam guddussa doora, diggah Yalli isi naqoosah yab yaabbi ken taamoomi yabali.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَصۡطَفِي مِنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ رُسُلٗا وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yaṣṭafī mina al-malāikati rusulan wamina al-nāsi inna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
